title: How I took 7 LANGUAGES in college| MIDDLEBURY COLLEGE| Tips to learn several languages at uni 🇪🇸

media:group.media:title: How I took 7 LANGUAGES in college| MIDDLEBURY COLLEGE| Tips to learn several languages at uni 🇪🇸
media:group.media:description:
Hey guys, in this video I wanna start a convo about how we can improve language programs at schools, and tell you about some things I wish I'd done in high school to get more language practice in. 😊 hope you enjoy 

📸 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/karen.loves.art/

🔥FREE APPS I RECOMEND 🤑:
- 🦜 TOUCAN (FREE chrome extension): https://jointoucan.com/partners/languagegirl

📓🖋BOOKS I RECOMMEND: 
🇺🇸 English (STIFF, THE CURIOUS LIFE OF HUMAN CADAVERS): https://amzn.to/39DB0rq
🇪🇸 Spanish (EL AMOR EN LOS TIEMPOS DEL COLERA): https://amzn.to/2QnOaBc
🇧🇷 Portuguese (ADULTERIO): https://amzn.to/2QmheZH
🇮🇹 Italian (GLI UMANI): https://amzn.to/2ST83Si
🇩🇪 German (TÖDLICHER SCHNEE): https://amzn.to/2QkzYc9
